## MoveOptions type

Options for the [SimpleEntityController.move()](./server.simpleentitycontroller.move.md) method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MoveOptions = {
    moveCallback?: MoveCallback;
    moveCompleteCallback?: MoveCompleteCallback;
    moveIgnoreAxes?: {
        x?: boolean;
        y?: boolean;
        z?: boolean;
    };
};
```
